int main ( ) { int n , i , j , k , lines ; scanf ( "%d
" , & n ) ; int arr [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & lines ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < lines ; j ++ ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d " , & arr [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } printf ( "
" ) ; } for ( j = lines - 2 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j ; k ++ ) { if ( arr [ j + 1 ] [ k ] > arr [ j + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) arr [ j ] [ k ] += arr [ j + 1 ] [ k ] ; else arr [ j ] [ k ] += arr [ j + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d
" , arr [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
